title: Willis and Crumble: Better Gnomes and Gardens
description: In this Oscar-nominated short, Willis and Crumble try out their garden gnome restoration machine with a new customer.
quote: You must come in for a spot of tea and a homemade marmite sandwich!
altHero: claymation-style characters, a man (Willis), a woman, and a dog (Crumble) dressed up as a garden gnome
alt1: Willis talks with a woman at her home, his van “Tip Top Gnome Restoration” is parked out front
alt2: Crumble drives a machine over a garden gnome
alt3: Crumble takes a break to eat lunch and a bird is messing with the machine behind him
alt4: Willis and the woman are having tea and Marmite sandwiches inside while out the window Crumble is being worked on by the gnome machine
